_header: Listeneth all as well as one / What telleth here good Saint John
_description: Gospel, ‘Feria quarta post Pascha’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
LVstneþ alle as wel as onWhat telleþ here goode seint
                    Ion…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…To þat Murþe bringe vs heÞat for vs dyede on
                    Rode tre. AMEN.

                poet.a.1,
